name: div
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
Index Finger Hood On Shell Backing: Provides protection for the catcher's index finger if they choose to wear it on the outside of the mitt
Adjustable Pocket System (APS): Allows players the ability to modify web & pocket to their preferred width
Pro Guard Padding (PGP): Provides Additional protection in the palm
GloveLocks Included On Thumb Lace: Helps keep a tight, secure fit & allows for quick one-handed adjustments
